Title: Pingu and the Packaging Material
Plot: Pingu is out shopping for a birthday present for Grandfather. He comes across a shop selling shells and goes in. He finds a nice spiky shell, which is put into an oval box just the right size for the shell. As Pingu is coming out of the shop he sees Pinga on her way to Grandfathers, carrying a box almost as big as she is. Pinga?s box is bigger than the one he?s got, so he goes back into the shop and asks if he can have a larger one. He turns down the first two offered as not being large enough,
